channel.title: Jinrake-Pkz [Bring Back Da best]
channel.description:
Well, my current server uses delta, and its getting boring and repetitive.
my dream: To have a action-packed server, 100-200 players online at a time.
my dream WAS Fulfilled last month, but the host has got crapper and so has the amount of players
I have chosen a base for my new server:
Zdiddy - Summon-Pkz
Before:
[QUOTE=Prima;841262][IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/logo4ch9-1.jpg[/img]
I'm releasing this because I want to start again from scratch, and Fully create another server from scratch. This was a PKing source, But I changed it back to normal, so you start in Lumbridge etc. THIS ISN'T FINISHED, Which means there still aren't NPC's where they should be, Quests that there should be, and Shops there should be. You can do this yourself, because I am not spending any more time on this, due to Starting from scratch, on a new source.
Download link is at the bottom of this Post.
[U][B]General Features[/B][/U]
[ul][*]Client.java size is now 963kb, was over 1.2mb before, cleaned a load of **** out of it. [*]There are ALOT of handlers, and classes, If there wasn't, it would all be piled into the Client class. [*]NPC Animations handled through A .CFG (Config) file, which makes it alot easier to use, and less codes to put it. [*]One FULLY Working quest - Lost City. [*]10 Non-Combat skills are Handled. [*]Half finished barrows. [*]Shops added where they should be. [*]FULLY Working 'Buy X' Option, only shows with my client (V6) - Link at bottom of post.[/ul]
[U][B]Combat Features[/B][/U]
[ul][*]FULL Skulling, Skulls show fully with prayer too, With My V6 Client - Link is at bottom of Post. [*]Full following - Right click & attacking. [*]The 'Attack' right-click option does not show up unless you are in the Wilderness, or fight pits. [*]Perfect Player Combat - NPC Combat is no-where near as good as Player, I focussed more on Player, since it used to be a PKing server. [*]Melee hits, Hit when the emote hits the player. [*]Blocking animations added. [*]Full Vengeance. [*]Almost all special attack's, including the Darj bow, and MSB (Magic ShortBow). [*]Ranged hits are delayed - As they should be. [*]Full Defence & Attack bonuses, against Melee Ranged, AND magic. [*]Full Magic spells on NPC's, only half have been added on players. [*]Full Wilderness levels, working with Magic too. [*]Full smite. [*]FULL Prayer. [*]Full Void Ranged increases Ranged hits, Full Void melee increases melee hits. [*]Full potions working, with level decreasing. [*]Vengeance recoils almost perfectly. [*]Working ring of recoil.[/ul]
[B][U]Pictures[/U][/B]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Summon-Pkz-3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AnimatedArmours.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/animarmour.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/dbowspec.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/magebowspec.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/ddsspec.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/skullpray.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/dmacespec.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/FullTeleport.gif[/img]
Have fun.[/QUOTE]
Latest Update:
- Packaged server - Taken out 20% More lagg
Things i hope to do to it:
- Reduce 60% Lagg - Take away junk frames - Get players on it - Add much more features to it - Make it a pking server
Things i have done to it:
- Removed 10 Class files, taken out 30% Lagg. - Removed moreinfo saving - Taken out junk from NpcHandler - Made the server a Universal Server - Fixed attacking in wild - Added a training area - Removed junk from process
- Now:
2MB, 37 Classes, Client: 600KB
WAS
8MB, 45 Classes, Client: 1.2MB +++
Progress chart:
Universal: |||||||||| Lagg-Free: |||||||||| Combat: |||||||||| Pking Server: |||||||||| Features: |||||||||| Overall: ||||||||||

item.dc:creator: @Gorilla_Lova Gorilla Lova
item.description:
@Gorilla_Lova wrote:

Pretty good, I see you’re really pretty good at coding ,

However, Don’t host a leeched 508, you could at least edit it next time.

P.S., your website’s a bit messed up, fix it up, make it look a bit more professional, and read your Private Messages.

Anyways, goodluck, and Merry Christmas.

  • Fixed player saving, custom setup for server
  • Added a seperate processing class, reducing lagg greatly
  • Taken out 16 things out the process
  • Taken out a further 2 classes from the server startup
  • Cleaned the server process line

item.title: Jinrake-Pkz [Bring Back Da best]
item.dc:creator: @Flame_pkz Flame pkz
item.description:
@Flame_pkz wrote:

Well, my current server uses delta, and its getting boring and repetitive.

my dream: To have a action-packed server, 100-200 players online at a time.

my dream WAS Fulfilled last month, but the host has got crapper and so has the amount of players

I have chosen a base for my new server:

Zdiddy - Summon-Pkz

Before:

[QUOTE=Prima;841262]

I’m releasing this because I want to start again from scratch, and Fully create another server from scratch. This was a PKing source, But I changed it back to normal, so you start in Lumbridge etc.
THIS ISN’T FINISHED, Which means there still aren’t NPC’s where they should be, Quests that there should be, and Shops there should be. You can do this yourself, because I am not spending any more time on this, due to Starting from scratch, on a new source.

Download link is at the bottom of this Post.

General Features

[ul][]Client.java size is now 963kb, was over 1.2mb before, cleaned a load of **** out of it.
[]There are ALOT of handlers, and classes, If there wasn’t, it would all be piled into the Client class.
[]NPC Animations handled through A .CFG (Config) file, which makes it alot easier to use, and less codes to put it.
[]One FULLY Working quest - Lost City.
[]10 Non-Combat skills are Handled.
[]Half finished barrows.
[]Shops added where they should be.
[]FULLY Working ‘Buy X’ Option, only shows with my client (V6) - Link at bottom of post.[/ul]

Combat Features

[ul][]FULL Skulling, Skulls show fully with prayer too, With My V6 Client - Link is at bottom of Post.
[]Full following - Right click & attacking.
[]The ‘Attack’ right-click option does not show up unless you are in the Wilderness, or fight pits.
[]Perfect Player Combat - NPC Combat is no-where near as good as Player, I focussed more on Player, since it used to be a PKing server.
[]Melee hits, Hit when the emote hits the player.
[]Blocking animations added.
[]Full Vengeance.
[]Almost all special attack’s, including the Darj bow, and MSB (Magic ShortBow).
[]Ranged hits are delayed - As they should be.
[]Full Defence & Attack bonuses, against Melee Ranged, AND magic.
[]Full Magic spells on NPC’s, only half have been added on players.
[]Full Wilderness levels, working with Magic too.
[]Full smite.
[]FULL Prayer.
[]Full Void Ranged increases Ranged hits, Full Void melee increases melee hits.
[]Full potions working, with level decreasing.
[]Vengeance recoils almost perfectly.
[]Working ring of recoil.[/ul]

Pictures

Summon-Pkz-3.png765×503

AnimatedArmours.jpg533×506

Have fun.[/QUOTE]

  • Packaged server
  • Taken out 20% More lagg

Things i hope to do to it:

  • Take away junk frames
  • Get players on it
  • Add much more features to it
  • Make it a pking server

  • Taken out junk from NpcHandler

  • Made the server a Universal Server

  • Fixed attacking in wild
